mapper.select: SELECT D.MEMBERNUM, M.MEMBERID, M.MEMBERNAME, D.CARNUM, D.ENROLLDATE, D.DRIVERSTATUS FROM MEMBER M, DRIVER D WHERE M.MEMBERNUM = D.MEMBERNUM ORDER BY D.ENROLLDATE DESC
